verses.verse: It happened,<WH3068> when Yahweh would take up<WH5927> Elijah<WH452> by a whirlwind<WH5591> into heaven,<WH8064> that Elijah<WH452> went<WH3212> with Elisha<WH477> from Gilgal.<WH1537>

Elijah<WH452> said<WH559> to Elisha,<WH477> "Please wait<WH3427> here,<WH3068> for Yahweh has sent<WH7971> me as far as Bethel.<WH1008>" Elisha<WH477> said,<WH559> "As Yahweh<WH3068> lives,<WH2416> and as your soul<WH5315> lives,<WH2416> I will not leave<WH5800> you.<WH3381>" So they went down to Bethel.<WH1008>

The sons<WH1121> of the prophets<WH5030> who were at Bethel<WH1008> came out<WH3318> to Elisha,<WH477> and said<WH559> to him,<WH3045> "Do you know that Yahweh<WH3068> will take away<WH3947> your master<WH113> from your head<WH7218> today?<WH3117>" He said,<WH559> "Yes,<WH3045> I know it;<WH2814> hold your peace."

Elijah<WH452> said<WH559> to him,<WH477> "Elisha, please wait<WH3427> here,<WH3068> for Yahweh has sent<WH7971> me to Jericho.<WH3405>" He said,<WH559> "As Yahweh<WH3068> lives,<WH2416> and as your soul<WH5315> lives,<WH2416> I will not leave<WH5800> you.<WH935>" So they came to Jericho.<WH3405>

The sons<WH1121> of the prophets<WH5030> who were at Jericho<WH3405> came<WH5066> near to Elisha,<WH477> and said<WH559> to him,<WH3045> "Do you know that Yahweh<WH3068> will take away<WH3947> your master<WH113> from your head<WH7218> today?<WH3117>" He answered,<WH559> "Yes,<WH3045> I know it.<WH2814> Hold your peace."

Elijah<WH452> said<WH559> to him,<WH3427> "Please wait here,<WH3068> for Yahweh has sent<WH7971> me to the Jordan.<WH3383>" He said,<WH559> "As Yahweh<WH3068> lives,<WH2416> and as your soul<WH5315> lives,<WH2416> I will not leave<WH5800> you.<WH8147>" They both went on.<WH3212>

Fifty<WH2572> men<WH376> of the sons<WH1121> of the prophets<WH5030> went,<WH1980> and stood<WH5975> opposite<WH5048> them at a distance;<WH7350> and they both<WH8147> stood<WH5975> by the Jordan.<WH3383>

Elijah<WH452> took<WH3947> his mantle,<WH155> and wrapped it together,<WH1563> and struck<WH5221> the waters,<WH4325> and they were divided<WH2673> here and there,<WH8147> so that they two went over<WH5674> on dry ground.<WH2724>

It happened,<WH5674> when they had gone over, that Elijah<WH452> said<WH559> to Elisha,<WH477> "Ask<WH7592> what I shall do<WH6213> for you,<WH3947> before I am taken from you.<WH477>" Elisha said,<WH559> "Please let a double<WH8147> portion<WH6310> of your spirit be on me.<WH7307>"
He said,<WH559> "You have asked<WH7592> a hard thing.<WH7185> If you see<WH7200> me when I am taken from you,<WH3947> it shall be so for you; but if not, it shall not be so."

It happened,<WH1980> as they still went on,<WH1980> and talked,<WH1696> that behold,<WH7393> a chariot of fire<WH784> and horses<WH5483> of fire<WH784> separated<WH6504> them;<WH8147> <WH996> and Elijah<WH452> went up<WH5927> by a whirlwind<WH5591> into heaven.<WH8064>

Elisha<WH477> saw<WH7200> it,<WH6817> and he cried, "My father,<WH1> my father,<WH1> the chariots<WH7393> of Israel<WH3478> and its horsemen!<WH6571>" He saw<WH7200> him no more:<WH2388> and he took hold of his own clothes,<WH899> and tore<WH7167> them in two<WH8147> pieces.<WH7168>
He took up<WH7311> also the mantle<WH155> of Elijah<WH452> that fell<WH5307> from him,<WH7725> and went back, and stood<WH5975> by the bank<WH8193> of the Jordan.<WH3383>

He took<WH3947> the mantle<WH155> of Elijah<WH452> that fell<WH5307> from him,<WH5221> and struck the waters,<WH4325> and said,<WH559> "Where is Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Elijah?<WH452>" When he also had struck<WH5221> the waters,<WH4325> they were divided<WH2673> here and there;<WH477> and Elisha went over.<WH5674>

When the sons<WH1121> of the prophets<WH5030> who were at Jericho<WH3405> over against him saw<WH7200> him,<WH559> they said, "The spirit<WH7307> of Elijah<WH452> rests<WH5117> on Elisha.<WH477>" They came<WH935> to meet<WH7125> him,<WH7812> and bowed themselves to the ground before him.<WH776>

They said<WH559> to him,<WH3426> "See now, there are with your servants<WH5650> fifty<WH2572> strong<WH2428> men.<WH1121> Please let them go<WH3212> and seek<WH1245> your master.<WH113> Perhaps the Spirit<WH7307> of Yahweh<WH3068> has taken him up,<WH5375> and put<WH7993> him on some<WH259> mountain,<WH2022> or into some<WH259> valley.<WH1516> He said,<WH559> "You shall not send them.<WH7971>"

When they urged<WH6484> him until he was ashamed,<WH954> he said,<WH559> "Send<WH7971> them.<WH7971>" They sent therefore fifty<WH2572> men;<WH376> and they searched<WH1245> for three<WH7969> days,<WH3117> but didn't<WH4672> find him.
They came back<WH7725> to him,<WH3427> while he stayed at Jericho;<WH3405> and he said<WH559> to them,<WH559> "Didn't I tell you,<WH3212> 'Don't go?'"

The men<WH582> of the city<WH5892> said<WH559> to Elisha,<WH477> "Behold,<WH4186> please, the situation of this city<WH5892> is pleasant,<WH2896> as my lord<WH113> sees;<WH7200> but the water<WH4325> is bad,<WH7451> and the land<WH776> miscarries.<WH7921>"
He said,<WH559> "Bring<WH3947> me a new<WH2319> jar,<WH6746> and put<WH7760> salt<WH4417> in it.<WH3947>" They brought it to him.

He went out<WH3318> to the spring<WH4161> of the waters,<WH4325> and threw<WH7993> salt<WH4417> into it,<WH559> and said, "Thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> <WH7495> 'I have healed these waters.<WH4325> There shall not be from there any more death<WH4194> or miscarrying.<WH7921>'"
So the waters<WH4325> were healed<WH7495> to this day,<WH3117> according to the word<WH1697> of Elisha<WH477> which he spoke.<WH1696>

He went up<WH5927> from there to Bethel.<WH1008> As he was going up<WH5927> by the way,<WH1870> some<WH6996> youths<WH5288> came out<WH3318> of the city<WH5892> and mocked<WH7046> him,<WH559> and said to him,<WH5927> "Go up, you baldy!<WH7142> Go up,<WH5927> you baldhead!<WH7142>"

He looked<WH7200> behind<WH310> him and saw<WH7200> them,<WH7043> and cursed them in the name<WH8034> of Yahweh.<WH3068> Two<WH8147> female bears<WH1677> came out<WH3318> of the woods,<WH3293> and mauled<WH1234> forty<WH705> - two<WH8147> of those youths.<WH3206>
He went<WH3212> from there to Mount<WH2022> Carmel,<WH3760> and from there he returned<WH7725> to Samaria.<WH8111>
